string.text:
The version of the AK-12 presented to the public in 2016. It differs from the previous version of the AK-12 shown in 2015 quite significantly in appearance and design. The mechanical design was revised both to eliminate a number of identified shortcomings and problems, and to improve manufacturing, taking into account the wishes of the military.
 %c[0,140,140,140]ATTACHMENTS: 
 %c[0,93,0,116] ï %c[0,140,140,140] Scopes: All scopes for Picatinny
 %c[0,93,0,116] ï %c[0,140,140,140] GP-25 grenade launcher
 %c[0,93,0,116] ï %c[0,140,140,140] Silencer: TGP-A
